Name: p_node_max_pu
Explanation: Maximum admissible active power in pu (only for OPF)

Name: p_node_min_pu
Explanation: Maximum admissible reactive power in pu (only for OPF)

Name: q_node_max_pu
Explanation: Minimum admissible active power in pu (only for OPF)

Name: q_node_min_pu
Explanation: Minimum admissible reactive power in pu (only for OPF)

Name: std_p_measured
Explanation: Standard deviation of the measured active power error

Name: std_q_measured
Explanation: Standard deviation of the measured reactive power error

Name: std_p_predicted
Explanation: Standard deviation of the predicted active power error

Name: std_q_predicted
Explanation: Standard deviation of the predicted reactive power error

Name: std_v
Explanation: Standard deviation of the measured voltage error
